name: Data Analyst
description:
EPAM Systems, founded in 1993, is the leading provider of IT outsourcing software services and solutions in Central and Eastern Europe. We have offices in 25+ countries in a world. EPAM is delivering advanced technology solutions at great value for our customers worldwide.

And EPAM Kazakhstan is one of the headquarters of EPAM.

We believe that the team you build is the company you build. We’re always looking for talented teammates. Think you’ve got what it takes?

Data Analyst

Responsibilities

  • Design and prepare customer reports, dashboards and analyses; create prototypes; turn models into results
  • Analyze, validate and visualize business data, create value-added solutions
  • Analyze business questions and deliver business answers; translate technical data findings for non-technical teams and vice versa
  • Become a visualization expert to empower the clients understanding their data
  • Provide insights and recommendations for clients based on the analysis
  • Conduct daily contact with customers, fill the role of a consultant
  • Participate in internal knowledge-sharing forums

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s/Master’s Degree in Information technology or Economics with a strong IT attitude
  • Work experience in an international enterprise size/servicing company
  • At least 2-3 years of data analysis experience (reporting, preferably in Power BI/Qlik View&Sense/Tableau/Spotfire and data manipulation techniques, preferably in SQL, RapidMiner/KNIME/Python/R)
  • Excellent communication skills, ability to work closely to clients
  • Fluent English is a must, both verbal and written
  • Self-motivated personality and excellent problem-solving skills, can-do attitude
  • Excellent time management skills, ability to work effectively with strict deadlines

Why EPAM?

  • This is an excellent opportunity to work in a distributed team on Agile methodologies
  • We work in close daily interaction with the customer
  • We do have many complex, interesting and ambitious tasks
  • In the future you can switch to any other project of the company
  • We gladly transfer our experience and knowledge (there are even special Competence Centers and a huge unit that develops employees)
  • We have all the buns and bonuses inherent in modern IT companies, life event bonuses and the relocation program to other countries.

We offer

  • Opportunity of participation in projects

  • Worldwide team of professionals - single-messengers

  • Training and career opportunity

  • Family support and care for employees’ children

  • Professional and corporate events

  • Sport and medical insurance
